description: This file initializes and renders the root React component into the DOM. It imports necessary dependencies including React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component. It sets up the application's root element and renders the React application within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering a React component tree into a DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
